articles.author: Orla McCaffrey
articles.title: Bank of America’s Quarterly Profit Falls 12% - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Other big U.S. banks reported first-quarter profit declines last week
articles.content:
Bank of America Corp. reported a 12% drop in first-quarter profit Monday, marking the end to an underwhelming earnings season for the countrys largest banks.
Last week, JPMorgan Chase & Co., Cit… [+195 chars]

articles.title: Health Official Says Brazil's Public Health Emergency Will be Lifted in a Few Days - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Citing a drop in deaths and infections. Brazil's health minister said Sunday that public health emergency measures will be lifted soon
articles.content: Brasília, Brazil  Brazil announced Sunday that, in just a few days, it will lift public health emergency measures in place for more than two years, citing a drop in the number of deaths and infection… [+1287 chars]
